meanings.definition: To make something common to all members of a group.
meanings.sent1: The teacher communizes the classroom supplies for everyone to use.
meanings.sent2: The community garden communizes the harvest among its members.
meanings.sent3: The camp counselor communizes the marshmallows for the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The leader communizes the vision, inspiring unity among the team.
meanings.sent5: The charity event communizes donations to help those in need.

meanings.definition: To establish a system of government in which all property is owned by the community.
meanings.sent1: The town council communizes the land for public use.
meanings.sent2: The commune communizes resources for the benefit of all residents.
meanings.sent3: The futuristic society communizes all possessions, leading to equality.
meanings.sent4: The utopian world communizes wealth, erasing social classes.
meanings.sent5: The cooperative farm communizes the crops for the entire village.

meanings.definition: To bring about a sense of shared ownership and responsibility among a group.
meanings.sent1: The team project communizes the success, fostering collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The company policy communizes decision-making, promoting teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The family dinner communizes the cooking duties, creating unity.
meanings.sent4: The school project communizes the effort, encouraging cooperation.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood cleanup communizes the pride in a clean environment.
